response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact on your operations, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000 for you. This is an exceptional opportunity considering the product's true worth of $15,000 and its significance to you. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
